timeline.message:
Merge pull request #12 from SkriptLang/master

Merge Upstream

timeline.bodyText: wouldn't it be nice to have add 1 to arrows stuck in player? this syntax doesn't allow that
timeline.author: Pikachu920

replies.bodyText: in fact i'm not sure if arrows stuck of player makes sense at all
replies.author: Pikachu920

replies.bodyText: Hmm... that's a good point. Will probably not be able to use a SPE for this expression.
replies.author: Wealthyturtle

replies.bodyText: you can use an SPE (and should), you just won't be able the prebuilt registration method
replies.author: Pikachu920

replies.bodyText: Hopefully the new pattern is better.
replies.author: Wealthyturtle
